edge: Ganga runs away with her older boyfriend Ramnik who promises her a film career under the tutelage of his aunt Sheela, but instead sells her to Sheela's brothel.
Sheela is the aunt of Ganga's boyfriend Ramnik, who runs a brothel and forces Ganga into prostitution.
Sheela is the owner of the brothel where Gangu is forced into prostitution.
After being brutally beaten by Rahim when she reports Shaukat's assault, Gangu earns the adoration of other prostitutes in the brothel.
Shaukat violently assaults Gangu, leaving her hospitalised.
When Shaukat reappears at the brothel after being beaten by Rahim, Gangu earns the adoration of other prostitutes for inspiring Rahim to beat Shaukat again.
After nine years, Gangu becomes the brothel's madame and is referred to as Gangubai.
When Rashmibai requests Gangubai to persuade a new prostitute, Madhu, into becoming a sex worker, Gangubai shares her own story and eventually sends Madhu back.
